nodes.text: Citypath 515 was a transit route located in Cityblock Kesk-319 on the world Brentaal IV as of 0 ABY. A tapcafe, the Pathline Tapcafe, was located at the intersection of Route 6903, another roadway, and Citypath 515. Citypath 515 was wide and active, like all streets in Kesk Cityblock, but was seldom used by people on foot and privately owned vehicles.

Citypath 515 was first mentioned in Raid on Brentaal, an adventure scenario in 1998's The Far Orbit Project, by Timothy S. O'Brien. The book was a supplement to West End Games's Star Wars: The Roleplaying Game and had the same theme of the previous publication Pirates & Privateers, as it followed the privateering frigate Far Orbit in its adventures.
